column2: One more Power-up to go. Ready?
Now we're going to create Power-up `'upgrade'`. Go to the coding panel.

This level is already spawning Power-ups of type `'upgrade'`. So let's change its special power. 

Click on the Power-up tab and look for the `activatePowerup()` function.

We need to add a new `if` statement for type `'upgrade'`. Let's try shrinking the ship! 

It's on a timer, like invulnerability, so we'll use `ship.shrinkTimer = 5;`
Just before the final `}` on the last line, type in `if (powerUpType == 'upgrade')`
And then `ship.shrinkTimer = 5;`. Then flip back around to see if that worked.
Let's give this level another try!
Those Power-ups should shrink our ship now.
The ship is not shrinking for some reason. Let's check the code.
Looks like you picked a Power-up of a different type.
You couldn't pick any Power-up? Odd. Are they actually being spawned?
There you go. It should make finishing the level much easier.
Perfect. A few more tweaks on this Power-up and we'll be almost ready.
Hope you'll come back soon. We need your help!
